data.title: The Hour of the Pig (1993) The Advocate
data.meta_description: The Hour of the Pig (1993)  DVDRip | AVI | 656x368 | XviD @ 1139 Kbps | 102 min | 979 Mb Audio: English AC3 2.0 @ 192 Kbps | Subs: English (srt)  Genre: Crime, Drama   In medieval France, young lawyer Richard Courtois leaves Paris for the simpler life in the country. However, he is soon drawn into amorous and political intrigues. At the same time, he is pushed to defend a pig, owned by the mysterious gypsy Samira. The pig has been arrested for the murder of a young boy.
